body.name: cimetech Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, Compact Full Size Wireless Computer Keyboard and Mouse Set 2.4G Ultra-Thin Sleek Design for Windows, Computer, Desktop, PC, Notebook, Laptop - Grey

features: 【Slim and Ergonomic Design】 The slim wireless keyboard and mouse combo has a tilt angle for the great typing position.Sweat-resistant, skin-friendly finish wireless mouse in contoured shape would provide hours of work comfortably. The full size wireless keyboard type fast with numeric keypad and instant access your music,internet,e-mail,volume,etc by multi-media hot keys.(The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac System)

【Less Noise&Profile Keys Typing】 The wireless keyboard's noise reduced keys and the silent click of the quiet mice will allow you to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment. The wireless keyboard and mouse combo features auto sleeping mode, plus on/off switches to help conserve battery use, you can go for months without the hassle of changing the batteries.(AA batteries are not included)

【Fast Operation 2.4G Wireless Plug and Play】 Simply connect both your portable wireless keyboard and mouse set with one USB receiver(The nano receiver just snap in the storage of mouse near battery compartment.) without any software and then enjoy a strong and reliable wireless connection up to 10 meters(33 ft) away with virtually no delays or dropouts.

【HIGH PRECITION】 Wireless Mouse DPI 1600 in 3 levels- You can easily change the cursor sensitivity of this cordless mouse depending on your activities;usually 800 DPI for office, DPI 1200-1600 for 4K resolution monitor or entertainment like gaming at home. 2 polling rate: 125Hz and 250Hz; adjusted by pressing the right key and the wheel simultaneously at 3s for change.

【Compatible Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo】 The keyboard and mouse combo includes a full-size keyboard and a high sensitivity mouse. Works with your PC, desktop computer, laptop or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 /10 operating systems.

【Sales support】: Our wireless keyboard kit products provide customers with perfect technical support, our customer service support team can quickly deal with any technical problems when you encounter problems.

【diseño delgado y ergonómico】 la delgada combinación de teclado y ratón inalámbrico tiene un ángulo de inclinación y se puede utilizar en una excelente posición de mecanografía. El ratón inalámbrico con forma de contorno antisudor y pro - piel puede funcionar cómodamente durante horas. El teclado inalámbrico de tamaño completo está equipado con un teclado digital que permite un acceso rápido a la música, internet, correo electrónico, volumen, etc. a través de teclas calientes multimedia. (las teclas calientes no son completamente compatibles con el sistema mac)

【reducción de ruido y mecanografía de teclas de contorno】 las teclas de reducción de ruido del teclado inalámbrico y los clics silenciosos del ratón le permitirán hacer su trabajo sin perder el sonido o interferir con el entorno. La combinación de teclado y ratón inalámbrico tiene un modo de sueño automático y, junto con los interruptores que ayudan a ahorrar el uso de la batería, puede prescindir de cambiar la batería durante varios meses. (excluyendo baterías aa)

【operación rápida 2.4G Plug and Play inalámbrico】 basta con conectar su teclado y Grupo de ratón inalámbrico portátil a un receptor USB (el nanoreceptor solo necesita insertar el espacio de almacenamiento del ratón cerca de la Caja de la batería), sin ningún software para disfrutar de una conexión inalámbrica potente y confiable a 10 metros (33 pies) de distancia, sin apenas retraso ni desprendimiento.

【alta precisión】 ratón inalámbrico de tres niveles DPI 1600 - puede cambiar fácilmente la sensibilidad del cursor de este ratón inalámbrico de acuerdo con sus propias actividades; Por lo general, 800 DPI se utilizan para oficinas y 1200 - 1600 DPI se utilizan para pantallas de resolución 4k o entretenimiento como jugar juegos en casa. 2 tasas de votación: 125 Hz y 250 hz; Presione el botón derecho y el rodillo durante 3 segundos para ajustarse para hacer cambios.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 15,140 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasted 3 years before USB broke...
reviews.reviewText: I loved this mouse and keyboard but after 3 years the USB that connects them ended up breaking and is now non-functional. I will be purchasing a new keyboard/mouse set that is bluetooth in order to eliminate this from happening again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is better than I imagined. Reviews made me nervous but I couldn’t be happier. Not experiencing any lag. Keyboard isn’t overly clacky and the mouse click is almost silent. Dongle is inside the mouse (got nervous mine was missing for a minute) numbers and letters are stickers though so keep that in mind. But it’s beautiful and lightweight. Backspace button is small that’s really the only “complaint” I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Missing some “key” function keys!
reviews.reviewText: This is not a defect, just flawed design! Most of the Fn keys are sound and music related (which I think would be useful for people who frequent with audio visual work) but for typical WFM use, it’s not useful. I love the calculator and lock buttons, more importantly, missing CTRL (windows) and FN (mac) buttons on the right. I like to type with both keys on each side as it’s awkward relying on one side of the keyboard to do so. These are just some of the “nit picky” items I identified that led me to purchase a very similar product but different brand (joy access) to go with instead. I just looooved the purple color on this one and it breaks my heart at the thought of needing to return because it doesn’t fulfill my needs, hence the 4 stars.In terms of functionality, it types well, it looks sleek, it feels comfortable, and it works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for the office
reviews.reviewText: I started with one of these at home during the pandemic. I was so happy I purchased another one when I returned to the office. The battery has lasted over a year even with daily use. The compact design of the keyboard that still allows for a number pad is great. The keyboard and mouse are both very responsive. The mouse fits into your hand perfectly and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard is nice for using with my HP laptop. Nice grey color scheme compact for traveling. The mouse is a bit slim for my big hand but it works and sleeps for battery saving. Overall, it's a deal that hard to beat IMHO.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't make my mistake! Things to consider before purchasing...
reviews.reviewText: Function of keys:I am a student, and I use "copy/paste" with control V and control C at least 100 times a day. This keyboard is missing the control key on the right side. In place of it is a key that gives a drop-down list where you may arrow down and choose copy or paste and other options. I cannot get used to using the control key on the left side versus the right. I don't need this key (see the arrow in my photo) when I can just right-click my mouse instead. For this reason, I will be returning the keyboard and mouse, yet I should have noticed this prior to purchase.NOTE: Pay attention to all the function keys, and do they fit your needs? For me, the numeric keypad is a must!Keystroke:The mechanism that makes the keys respond to touch is 'switch'. I'm learning that rubber dome switches, scissor switches, and mechanical switches are the primary types of switches used by most manufacturers. The switches make all the difference in sensitivity, level of noise, and comfort. I like that this keyboard uses scissor switches; it's comfortable and quiet to type.Design:The mouse is great, and I like the finish of the keys; they have a matte finish that has a good feel while typing. This keyboard has a sleek design and is lightweight.Because I suffer from carpal tunnel syndrome, I'm realizing I'd be better off with an ergonomic keyboard, which is designed to position your hands naturally and reduce strain by offering a proper wrist rest to maximize comfort.Compatibility:Wireless keyboards connect to the system via Bluetooth and can be somewhat tricky to setup, unlike plug-and-play USB cord keyboards, yet I had no issues with setup. Make sure you have AA batteries, and conveniently, there is only one USB receiver that controls both the keyboard and the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the sleep function.
reviews.reviewText: Moving the mouse doesn't take it out of sleep mode and there's no indication it's gone to sleep.For some reason I really didn't like having to press a key or click the mouse to wake it up.Since I'm on the computer just about every second I'm not sleeping, I just used an autohotkey script to keep it from going to sleep. I'll stop it before I go to sleep to conserve the battery. I already keep a 20 pack of AA batteries in a drawer anyway so there's no worries.Overall I'm very happy with it. I got the blue which matches my decor and is very slick looking ( I use a navy tablecloth over a table for a desk and the color is close enough).--- AutoHotkey statements ---^+o::loop{ MouseGetPos, xpos, ypos xpos:=xpos + 5 mousemove %xpos%, %ypos% xpos:=xpos - 5 mousemove %xpos%, %ypos% sleep 870000; (in milliseconds = 14.5 minutes)}

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it so far, good price, good quality, nice look
reviews.reviewText: I am using a Macbook Pro at home so I needed a keyboard that is compatible with iOS and that can ease my typing when working from home. So far, I am pleased with the product. It has a number of things that I like:- the keyboard is compact with a nice color and look, which fits great next to my Macbook.- the keyboard has soft clicks, which is similar to my keyboard at the office, so I like it. When typing fast, you might feel that the keys and the whole keyboard is slightly wiggly, which is fine to me but might feel weird for some pple.- The mouse has silent clicks as well, which is good when working late at home.- the Bluetooth setup is simple, the keyboard shortcuts work with iOS (e.g., the cmnd key), the mouse sometimes experience some lags, which is not a big deal, unless if you want to pay games online.- Although the keyboard setup and key size/location might feel different, I have already got used to it quickly. Also, I like the extended number pad. which helps me enter numbers quicker and easier.So, to summarize, you need to try it to see if it works with you as people may have different expectations

The keys are low profile and easy to use...I had hoped for a bit more of a rubbery feel but they're hard plastic just like other keyboards. Still, light touch and responsive so that's all good.The keys are the right size and distance apart so i didnt have to adapt. Only difference is that the backspace button is half-size so sometimes i hit delete when meaning to hit backspace.The mouse is perfect - I have a relatively large hand and it fits just fine...I like that i can change the scrolling responsiveness.You really can't go wrong if you want a small (compact, low profile) keyboard with numberpad that works like a full-size one and actually looks good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good keyboard & mouse combo at great price
reviews.reviewText: Keys are a bit thight close to each other (thus the 4 star rating, instead of 5). Everything else is great: solid built, good feel and feedback from key press. Mouse movement is adjustable. I like it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty looking keyboard, no frills, some keys like spacebar are not as responsive, mouse a bit tight
reviews.reviewText: Asked for a return as a few function keys are not working. The chocolate keys and even the mouse are silent but are not as responsive. Space bar gives a miss many times while typing. I had liked the whole look and size provided it had worked properly.What I like is the fact that it looks neat and is silent but one has to get used to the layout. Not having Ctrl key on the right side is very frustrating while typing. The arrow keys are too small for continuous use.Edited : Cancelled the return as after using it for a few days the keys have become a little better and I have re-mapped the right menu key to ctrl and it works for me.It seems to be a good buy at 1287 ( under 1300) for me but if it was more, then definitely no. I does not deserve to be more expensive than this price ( as I saw a different colour of the same keyboard listed as 11,000 something and even this model was later listed at around 8000 before going out of stock)All in all , an ok product. takes a while getting used to the layout and response.A delicate looking piece meant for easy use. For someone who types so regularly and vigorously like me, its a good change but I plan to move to a mechanical soon , so a good stop gap arrangement.
Perfect keyboard and mouse! I really like it.
